name: Fission-heated Steam
imageDescription: A spacecraft with a large 252 tonne Kevlar composite water bladder attached to a particle bed steam engine with 200:1 de Laval nozzle, shown against a lunar surface backdrop.

name: Fission GCR
ability: Can liftoff/land on Sites that are less than size 6 without factory-assist. EXOPLANET HUNT FUTURE: Req = Claim Sedna. Effect = (Endgame) 12 VP.
imageDescription: A solar gravitational lensing observatory concept showing a spacecraft at 550 AU with O'Meara aluminum film fresnel lens, solar occulter, MAG boom with flux-gate magnetometers, and 15m megapixel CCD array.

name: Fusion Fragment Sail
ability: Immune to flares & radiation belts. The sail is steered using inertial-confinement A-LIFT fusion.
imageDescription: A cylindrical spacecraft with CH2-Boron-11 composite target being hit by psec laser pulses, creating fusion particles that drive a sail through radioactive nanoparticles held in an axial magnetic field.

name: Antiproton Sail and Harvester
ability: +1 net thrust if starting its move on a radiation belt. ANTIMATTER FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with S Dirtside. Effects = double isotope refuel, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A spacecraft with a 75m diameter uranium-coated carbon sail and superconducting loop, featuring an antiproton-driven scintillation generator and positively-charged electrostatic trap for antimatter storage.

name: HIIPER Beam Rider
imageDescription: An electric engine with helicon plasma generator and inertial electrostatic accelerator, featuring a 312m collector diameter and biased spherical IEC potential well creating a collimated plasma beam.

name: Magnetic Mirror Beam Rider
ability: Can liftoff/land on Sites that are less than size 6 without factory-assist. STAR WISP FUTURE: Req = Promoted Freighter (End game) at either neutrino sunlens (6VP) or EM sunlens = 11VP.
imageDescription: A beam rider spacecraft with shielded S coil, stem lasers, closed field lines connecting to galactic fields, and neutral Na atom beam at 0.56%c with reflected plasma plume.

name: Inflatable Solar-heated
ability: Factory loading only. SOLAR HEATED: If not using Powersat, may move out only as far as the Ceres zone.
imageDescription: A spacecraft with 185m inflatable optics collector directing sunlight through quartz lens and reradiation shield into a carbon-shelled heat exchanger with black Re coating and rhenium foam, connected to ZBO LH2 tank.

name: Archimedes Palmer Lens
ability: Factory loading only. SOLAR HEATED: If not using Powersat, may move out only as far as the Jupiter zone. TERRAFORM FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal at a non-martian Atmospheric Dirtside. Effect = 8 VP.
imageDescription: A fleet of thousands of photon sails entrained by two intersecting Palmer lasers reflecting sunlight to superheat propellant, shown as a mesh-like sail structure in a purple-tinted atmosphere.

name: Poodle Steam
ability: Factory loading only. RADIOISOTOPE: +2 thrust if its move starts on a Factory.
imageDescription: A radioisotope-powered spacecraft with plenum containing radioisotope matrix, H2 hot bleed line, turbopump, and de Laval nozzle, with H2 regenerative cooling line and an astronaut for scale.

name: D-nanotube Dirt Launcher
ability: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.
imageDescription: A kinetically-supported system with whirling 2mm carbon nanotube cables ejecting regolith at 3 gees, featuring forward roller, 800m bucket loading, nuclear turbines, and 3 gravity buckets.

name: Rotary Dirt Launcher
imageDescription: A 17 tonne Kevlar rotary pellet launcher with 30m long, 1m diameter tube ejecting 10g compressed regolith pellets, featuring robonaut tractor, pellet formation conveyor belt, and rotating RPL tube with TiNi anti-wear lining.

name: KESTS Hoop Dirt Launcher
ability: Factory loading only. BEEHIVE ARK FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal anchored at a Synodic Comet. Effect = 7 VP.
imageDescription: Kinetically supported lifting hoops attached to a small world's equator ejecting regolith at 3 gees, with counterrotating internal mass armatures, Bernal docking station in synchronous orbit, and human-rated maglev vehicle.

name: Z-Pinch D-T/6Li Fusion
ability: GOLDEN APPLES FUTURE: Req = Industrialize kreutz sungrazer. Effects = Ignore solar flares, 14 VP.
imageDescription: Helium-3 aerostats distilling gas giant atmospheres for helium-3 and deuterium, featuring 70 tonne Z-pinch tanker, 80m insulated balloon, 146 tonne 3He distillation plant, and hot air nuclear reactor.

name: Z-Pinch 3He-D Target Fusion
ability: GOLDEN APPLES FUTURE: Req = Industrialize kreutz sungrazer. Effects = Ignore solar flares, 14 VP.
imageDescription: Helium-3 aerostats distilling gas giant atmospheres for helium-3 and deuterium, featuring 70 tonne Z-pinch tanker, 80m insulated balloon, 146 tonne 3He distillation plant, and hot air nuclear reactor.
